text: Gujrat Railway Station (Urdu and ) is located in Gujrat city, Gujrat district of Punjab province, Pakistan. It is an important station in Karachi–Peshawar Railway Line. The railway station serves the city of Gujrat and its surroundings. Almost all the passenger trains that run between Lahore and Rawalpindi make a stop in this station. title: Gujrat railway station
